#### Welcome to this quick guide

This self-study quick guide covers the core principles of responsible research assessment including responsible use of research metrics. It can be completed in your own time.

This guide is designed for:

-   Anyone involved in research assessment as part of a recruitment, promotion, redundancy or other appointment, award or recognition processes
-   Anyone assessing research or a research track record as part of peer review of outputs or proposals
-   Anyone who is interested in how research can be assessed

For help please contact Alex Peden, Head of Research Cultures via research.cultures@ed.ac.uk
